Ensure the progress bar becomes visible with 75% value and background #28a745 during upload
Verify the component's overall width is 400px and it has 1px dashed #999999 border
Click the 'Share' icon

Verify a share popover appears, visible directly above the icon, contains exactly 3 social media share options, has border radius 8px, opacity 0.95, width 200px, and animates its appearance with 150ms scale-up animation
Check the 'Facebook' share button has background color #3b5998 and text 'Share on Facebook'
Confirm the 'Copy Link' button has aria-label 'Copy shareable link'
Inspect the main search bar

Verify its placeholder text is 'Search products...', is not focused initially, width 300px, height 40px, 10px left and right padding, 1px solid #aaaaaa border, border radius 20px, and text color #333333
Ensure the magnifying glass icon source is 'icons/search.svg' and its alt text is 'Search icon'
Type 'laptop' into the search bar
Verify 5 suggestion items display below the search bar with font size 14px
Examine the interactive map
Verify a map pin element is visible at coordinates x 150, y 200, its image source is 'icons/map_pin_red.svg', rendered dimensions are 24x32px, and has alt text 'Location marker for destination A'
Ensure the associated information box for the pin has background color #ffffff and a border radius of 5px
Verify the 'Zoom In' button is enabled and has a text size of 18px
Confirm the map is not currently in fullscreen mode
Verify the 'Submit' button is enabled, has background color #007bff, text color #ffffff, font size 16px, font weight 500, border radius 4px, padding 10px 20px, and displays text 'Submit'
On mouse hover, verify its background color transitions to #0056b3 over 200ms

Upon page load, verify the hero image element has source 'hero_banner.jpg', loads within 400ms, rendered dimensions 1200x400px, natural dimensions 1920x640px, alt text 'Promotional banner for new products', and opacity 1
Check the search input field has placeholder text 'Search products...', 1px solid #cccccc border, width 250px, height 38px, font size 14px, and aria-label 'Search field'
On focus, confirm its border color changes to #007bff and it is positioned at x 50, y 50
Confirm the 'Contact Us' navigation link displays text 'Contact Us', has color #333333, font weight 400, and is aligned to the right
On active state, confirm its background color becomes #f0f0f0 with 2px bottom border of #007bff

When the 'View Details' button is clicked, verify the product modal dialog becomes visible, positioned centrally at x 50% y 50%, with width 600px, height 450px, and an overlay background color rgba(0,0,0,0.7) that fades in over 300ms

Ensure the embedded video player is initially muted, not in fullscreen mode, has width 640px, height 360px, shows a watermark 'DEMO' at its bottom right corner with opacity 0.5, and its source is 'demo_video.mp4'
Validate the product listing page displays exactly 12 product cards
Validate each product card has width 280px, height 350px, and is aligned in a grid layout
Validate each card's price text has font size 18px and color #cc0000
Verify the count of items in the cart is 0 initially

Verify the main content paragraph uses font family 'Arial, sans-serif', text color #444444, font size 16px, text align 'left', padding 20px, and line height (simulated via margin-bottom) 24px for its text content
Scroll down by 200px
Confirm the header element's top position remains at 0px, its height is 60px, and its background color is #ffffff with a 1px solid #e0e0e0 bottom border, indicating it is sticky
When submitting an empty 'Username' field, verify an error message 'Username is required.' appears below the field, with text color #dc3545, font size 12px, is visible, and fades in over 150ms
Check the 'Category' dropdown menu initially displays 'All Categories' as its value, has width 200px, height 40px, and contains exactly 5 selectable options
Verify each selectable option in the 'Category' dropdown has padding 8px 12px
Verify the left sidebar is initially visible with width 250px, background color #f8f9fa, and left position 0px
When the 'Toggle Sidebar' button is clicked, confirm it transitions to hidden state and its width becomes 0px over 300ms
After uploading a file, verify the progress bar displays width 75%, has background color #28a745, and shows text '75% Complete' with font size 14px and color #ffffff inside
Confirm the date picker input field has placeholder 'Select Date' and its current value is '2023-10-26'
Upon clicking the date picker input field, confirm the calendar widget becomes visible with today's date highlighted with background color #007bff
Verify the 'Add to Cart' icon has source 'add_to_cart_icon.svg', rendered dimensions 24x24px, and aria-label 'Add product to cart'
On mouse over, confirm its opacity changes to 0.8 within 100ms
Check that each row in the data table has padding 12px and a 1px solid #e9ecef border-bottom
On active selection, check that each row's background color changes to #e2e6ea with 2px left border of #007bff
Validate the pagination control displays exactly 5 page numbers
Validate the currently active page (e.g., '3') has background color #007bff and text color #ffffff
Validate other (inactive) pages have text color #007bff and background #ffffff

When hovering over the 'Help' icon, verify a tooltip becomes visible, positioned at x +10px, y +20px relative to the icon, displaying text 'Get assistance here' with background color #333333, text color #ffffff, and fading in over 100ms
Ensure the image carousel has width 800px, height 500px, cycles images every 5s with 800ms slide animation duration, and the current image source is 'carousel_image_1.jpg'
Confirm 'Next' button is enabled
Confirm 'Previous' button is enabled
Verify the footer element contains text '© 2023 All Rights Reserved', has font size 14px, text color #6c757d, background color #f8f9fa, padding 20px, and is positioned at the bottom of the viewport
